effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.black_white: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. The user also takes terrible damage.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. The user also takes terrible damage.
